item.title: Splitting WordPress Export File with ChoppedPress
item.description: You’re all probably tired of hearing me talking about my script to split the XML-like file that WordPress generates when you use the Export feature. Tonight I have finally added the final touches to it and can now share it here with you. If you don’t remember, I wrote it because my good friend Evandro from QuartoEstudio.com is always getting asked by some of his clients to migrate an existing web blog to a new host/domain and hands him a tarball containing the exported content of a WordPress blog in XML format.
